testcase.name: Verify calculation logic for carbohydrate intake
testcase.system-out: When user click "Metrik unit" buttom........................................passed Given the user enters their age as "30".....................................passed And the user selects their gender as "male".................................passed And the user enters their height as "180"...................................passed And the user enters their weight as "75"....................................passed And the user selects their activity level as "0"............................passed When the user submits the form..............................................passed Then verify the calculated carbohydrate intake should be "312.5" grams per day.passed
